Our LocationWelcome to the Millenium City

Welcome to Gurgaon- the best of both worlds

Gurgaon is one of the most exciting, vibrant and colourful regions within the whole country, and is guaranteed to help you discover something new every day. Seeped in history and culture, Gurgaon is a beautiful medley of both old and new living harmoniously side by side, providing you with the best of both worlds.

Shopping and retail therapy

With Gurgaon’s famous Mall Mile just 30 minutes away from campus, you can shop till you drop with ease. Better yet, the city’s most beloved Ambiance and Emporio shopping centers are also just a short distance away, boasting some of the most famous high street brands from across the world.

Stay active- stay happy

Sports fans can rejoice, as there’s plenty to keep you occupied in and around Gurgaon and Delhi. You’ll find a dearth of gyms and clubs across the city, with sports academies, cricket and football clubs, and paintball facilities for some more invigorating experiences.

Explore the great outdoors

For a quick getaway, Leisure Valley or Tau Devi Lal Biodiversity Park offer gorgeous scenery for a morning jog or a midday getaway. For those looking for more of a walk on the wild side, Haryana has a range of national parks packed with stunning scenery and breath-taking wildlife.

A world of weekend getaways

There’s no shortage of places to explore in and around Gurgaon. If you’re feeling like a short getaway, both Gurgaon and Delhi NCR have something for everyone. The Aravalli hills offer no shortage of adventure sports, sightseeing and picnic opportunities.

A little bit of something for everyone

With something specially happening every weekend, everyone is bound to find their hands full with things to do. Our close proximity to the heart of Gurgaon keeps you in on the action with minimal effort- and minimum travel time. Less time spent in traffic means more time spent having a great time.

Just a few more things that make Gurugram a great place to be
